description: Ms. codex. Manuscript erroneously foliated beginning on the fourth leaf. Record follows erroneous foliation. Physical description: 21 lines per page; written in naskh in black on glazed, laid European paper. Catchwords. Some damp-staining and a few repairs. Covers are detached. Origin: 19th century.
abstract: Collection of texts on Shiʻite law.
contents: 1. fol. 1b-32b: Masāʼil wa-rasāʼil min Muhannā ibn Sinān / Ibn al-Muṭahhar al-Ḥillī.
2. fol. 32b-33a: [Ijāzah for Muhannā ibn Sinān] / Ibn al-Muṭahhar al-Ḥillī.
3. fol. 33b-36b: [Ajwibat masāʼil Muhannā ibn Sinān] / Fakhr al-Muḥaqqiqīn.
4. fol. 37b-69b: Nuzhat al-nāẓir fī al-jamʻ bayna al-ashbāh wa-al-naẓāʼir / Yaḥyá ibn Saʻīd al-Ḥillī.
5. fol. 70b-93b: Manbaʻ al-ḥayāh fī ḥujjīyat qawl al-mujtahid min al-amwāt / Niʻmat Allāh ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Jazāʼirī.
6. fol. 94b-177b: Ghunyah / Ḥamzah ibn ʻAlī ibn Zuhrah.

title.@value: مسائل ورسائل من مهنا بن سنان.
Masāʼil wa-rasāʼil min Muhannā ibn Sinān ... [etc.].

subject: Manuscripts, Arabic—New Jersey—Princeton
call_number: Oversize Islamic Manuscripts, New Series no. 960q
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
